title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 604.11 - Backing vehicles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 604.11 - Backing vehicles

State Regulations

No person shall back a vehicle upon the vehicular crossing
unless such movement can be made with safety and without interfering with other
traffic. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
604.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
